AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive
AmmoCategoryDef.description: The high-explosive charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: EMP
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.
